name: Biker Rage
description:
Oldman Erwin is angry, and will kill everyone in his path.

After being wronged, Erwin searches for his enemies (the punks) only to know that everyone has inner demons (and outer too).

3 short levels, with a final boss on every level.

Controls:

Menu: Mouse driven

In-game: Arrow keys (up/down) to move, space to shoot.
